Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

Select your army and explore the nearby sector. Locate and investigate the Overgrown Biodome.[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Hint: you can see your progress in your currently active quests in the Objectives interface.[/recommendedcol]
选择你的军队并探索附近区域。找到并调查巨型生物穹顶。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：你可以在目标界面查看当前激活任务的进度。[/recommendedcol]
Imperial Biodome - Food producing location on the map
Take control of the Overgrown Biodome
Planetfall successful, Commander. Powering up base colony systems.
行星着陆成功，指挥官。正在启动基地殖民地系统。

Good, there is no time to waste. We'll start by setting up and expanding this colony. Start a surface scan for survivors and existing colony infrastructure. Inform me when our research systems are online.
很好，已经没有时间可以浪费了。我们将先从建造和扩张殖民地开始。进行表面扫描，搜寻幸存者和现有的殖民地基础设施。研究系统上线后通知我。
Yes, Commander. Recalibrating sensors and initiating surface scan…[br/][br/]A biodome has been located nearby, but there are no signs of survivors.
好的，指挥官。正在校正传感器并启动表面扫描…[br/][br/]附近发现了一个生物穹顶，但没有任何幸存者的迹象。

Continue scanning the planet surface. If there are any survivors on this world, I want to know about it. I'll scout the adjacent sectors and investigate the biodome - it should contain supplies that will help us expand our colony.
继续扫描行星表面，我想知道这个星球中是否有任何幸存者。我会侦察相邻区域并调查生物穹顶，里面应该有能帮助我们扩张殖民地的补给。

Open the colony interface and complete the ‘Central Replicator Facility’ production project, found in the Structure Production tab.[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Hint: the colony interface can be opened by selecting the colony. If there is an army standing on top of it, your first press will select the army, and a second press will then select the colony itself.[/recommendedcol]
打开殖民地界面，完成建筑生产选项卡中的“中央复制设施”生产项目。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：殖民地界面可通过选中相应殖民地的方式打开。如果殖民地上站有任何军队，你的第一次点击将会选中该军队，第二次点击才会选中殖民地。[/recommendedcol]
Central Replicator Facility - A structure that is build in colonies

Colony production facilities are currently idle, Commander.[br/]I recommend we start with building the[br/][recommendedcol]Central Replicator Facility[/recommendedcol] [recommended/] to increase production.[br/][br/]I have highlighted this structure in the colony interface.
指挥官，殖民地的生产设施当前正处于闲置状态。[br/]我们应该建造[br/][recommendedcol]中央复制设施[/recommendedcol][recommended/]来提高产力。[br/][br/]我已经在殖民地界面上高亮显示出了该建筑。

There are no survivors here. It looks like the structure was overrun by critters.[br/][br/]We must reclaim this biodome and annex its sector to our colony. This will expand our domain and increase our supplies.
这里没有任何幸存者，这栋建筑似乎被一些生物给占领了。[br/][br/]我们必须夺回这个生物穹顶并将其区域吞并至我们的殖民地，这将扩张我们的领域并增加我们的补给。
We do not have enough colonists to control additional sectors yet, Commander. We will need additional food to allow the colony to grow. Larger colonies can sustain more province sectors.
我们没有足够的移住民来控制更多的区域，指挥官。我们需要更多的食物使殖民地继续壮大。规模更大的殖民地能够容纳更多的省区区域。
I want to establish our foothold here as quickly as possible. We can recover extra food from the Overgrown Biodome after we clear out the wildlife.
我希望尽快在此处建造立足点。我们可以在清理掉巨型生物穹顶中的野生生物后获得更多食物。
Commander, our laboratories have come online and Research is now available. We can begin researching technologies to unlock new deployments to help us on this planet.
指挥官，我们的实验室已经上线，研究系统已经可以使用了。现在，我们可以研究科技来解锁新的部署，帮助我们在这个星球上的行动。
Excellent. What do you suggest we start with, considering our mission parameters?
非常好，考虑到我们的任务参数，你觉得我们从哪里开始比较好？

For Military Research, it is recommended to start with[br/][recommendedcol]Nanite Support[/recommendedcol] [recommended/] to provide our troops with extra protection and unlock battlefield support operations.[br/][br/]For Society Research, it is recommended to start with[br/][recommendedcol]Frontier Facilities[/recommendedcol] [recommended/] to unlock basic infrastructure upgrades for our colony. [br/][br/]I have highlighted these skills in the research interface for your convenience.

对军事研究来说，建议先从研究[br/][recommendedcol]纳米机器人辅助[/recommendedcol][recommended/]开始，因为这可以为我们的部队提供额外的保护并解锁新的战场辅助行动。[br/][br/]对社会研究来说，建议先研究[br/][recommendedcol]边境设施[/recommendedcol][recommended/]来为我们的殖民地解锁基础设施升级。[br/][br/]为便利起见，我已经在研究界面将这些技能高亮显示了出来。
Nanite Support and Frontier Facilities - Tech Names
Expand your colony by annexing the nearby sector.[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Hint: you can annex a sector by selecting 'Annex Sector' in the available options.[/recommendedcol]
你可以通过吞并附近区域来扩张你的殖民地。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：你可以在可用选项中选择“吞并区域”来进行吞并。[/recommendedcol]
Annex Sector - Refers to interface button
Annex a sector to your colony
为你的殖民地吞并一个区域
Commander, our colony has now grown big enough to support an additional sector. I recommend annexing the sector which contains the biodome, as this will add its food income to our colony.
指挥官，我们的殖民地已经足够壮大，可以容纳更多区域了。我建议吞并包含生物穹顶的区域，因为这能够增加我们殖民地的食物收益。
Good. We'll annex this sector to our colony as a province sector so we can start exploiting the land for resources as soon as possible.
很好。我们将把这个区域作为省区区域吞并至我们的殖民地，这样我们就可以尽快开发这片区域里的资源了。
Commander, that sector has been successfully annexed to our colony, and is now considered a province sector. It can now be exploited for additional resources.
指挥官，该区域已成功吞并至我们的殖民地，现在已经成为了我们殖民地的省区，可用来开发更多资源。
Let's get this exploitation up and running as soon as possible. What does terrain analysis tell us? How can we best exploit our new province sector?
让我们尽快进行开发吧。地形分析如何？怎样才能最好地开发我们新的省区区域？

Analyzing...[br/][br/]Clime: Fungal ([supply/]/[research/])[br/]Terrain: Fertile Plains ([supply/]/[research/])[br/]Resource Node: Biodome ([supply/])[br/]Processing analysis...[br/][br/]Recommendation: [recommendedcol]Agriculture Exploitation[/recommendedcol][recommended/][br/][br/]An agriculture exploitation will synergize with both the clime and terrain, allowing the sector to reach its full potential through research and construction.[br/][br/]The biodome will also synergize with an agriculture exploitation, providing an additional bonus to food income.

正在分析…[br/][br/]气候：真菌（[supply/]/[research/]）[br/]地形：肥沃平原（[supply/]/[research/]）[br/]资源节点：生物穹顶（[supply/]）[br/]正在处理分析…[br/][br/]建议：[recommendedcol]农业开发点[/recommendedcol][recommended/][br/][br/]农业开发点将与该区域的气候和地形产生协同效果，通过研究和建造能够释放该区域的最大潜力。[br/][br/]生物穹顶也与农业开发点具有协同效果，能够为食物收益提供额外加成。

Fungal - Clime Name
Fertile Plains - Terrain Name
Agriculture Exploitation - Name of a sector exploitation that specializes on food
Locate the Vanguard military signal in the nearby sector.
在附近区域找到先锋的军事信号。
Surface scan completed, Commander. I am picking up a Vanguard military signal nearby. This could signify the presence of survivors on the planet.
地面扫描完成，指挥官。我接收到了一条来自附近的先锋军事信号，这可能意味着星球上存在幸存者。
Bring it up on scanners. Let's find out what the hell is going on here.
把扫描器拿来，让我们看看这里到底发生了什么。
Lieutenant Jiang? What the hell are you doing on this rock? Last I heard, you were stationed on Leave-6.
蒋中尉？你在这石头上做什么？我上一次听说你驻军留在离别 6 号星球上了。
Lieutenant Jiang - Female Vanguard Hero Name

Commander {STR_LeaderName}! I require your immediate assistance! Our settlement is overrun with Hopperhounds and we need help fighting them off. We are sending you blueprints for some weapon modifications, let's burn these bugs down.
{STR_LeaderName}指挥官！我需要立即协助！我们的定居点遭到了跳蝗的入侵，我们需要人帮忙击退它们。我们正在向您发送一些武器模块的蓝图，让我们把这些虫子全部烧死吧。

Hopperhounds - Marauder/Enemy faction that is hostile to the player, made of giant alien beetles and grasshoppers
NO LOCALIZATION NEEDED, fixed the following: Capitalized the "L" in "STR_leaderName"
Received Lieutenant, we'll make quick work of these bugs.
收到，中尉。我们将速战速决。
Commander, before engaging in battle, we should mod our units to make them more combat-effective.[br/][br/]Select our army, and inspect units in the army panel below to see and equip mods.
指挥官，在进入战斗前，我们应该为单位装备一些模块来提高他们的战斗效率。[br/][br/]选择我们的军队，查看下方军队面板中的单位即可查看并装备模块。

We can equip the mods Lieutenant Jiang gave us on troops or your weapons commander. Please bear in mind that while the process is immediate on your weapons, modifying our troops leaves them vulnerable for a single cycle.
我们可以把蒋中尉发送给我们的模块装备到部队或你的武器上，指挥官。请谨记，为你的武器装备模块将立即完成，但为部队装备模块会使他们在一个回合中变得十分脆弱。
Explore the nearby sector to find the Voidtech landmark
探索附近区域寻找虚空科技地标
Voidtech Landmark - A silver landmark that normally house hostiles, empty in this campaign
Thank you, Commander. You got us out of a tight spot there.
非常感谢，指挥官。你将我们从水深火热中拉了出来。
Don't mention it, Lieutenant. Status report. What happened here?
不用谢，中尉。汇报一下情况，这里发生了什么？
A force of Outlanders made planetfall a few cycles ago and assaulted our positions. Their assault was centered on the Voidtech facility nearby. We fought them off, but we suffered heavy casualties…
拓荒者在数个周期前降落至了这个星球并袭击了我们的窝点。虽然我们击退了他们，但我们的损失非常惨重…
Outlander - Any race from outside of the Star Union Empire, made of outcasts and small empires.
None on their side, but our colony was burned to the ground during the assault. You are looking at all that remains of my detachment and the colony.
敌人全军覆没，但我们的殖民地也在袭击中被烧成了灰烬。现在你所看到的就是我们所剩下的部队和殖民地。
What a mess... I'm sorry about your casualties, Lieutenant. What about this Voidtech facility? Why were they after it?
真是一场悲剧…我为你的损失感到遗憾，中尉。这个虚空科技设施到底是什么？为什么他们想要夺走它？
I don’t know, Commander. All of the scientists who knew of the facility perished in the assault. With our colony destroyed, we were unable to annex the landmark to investigate it further.
我不知道，指挥官。所有知情的科学家都在袭击中被杀害了。由于我们的殖民地遭到了摧毁，我们也无法吞并那个地标并开展进一步调查。

Alright, let's get things back on track. I’ll take command here. Pack up your settlement so we can redeploy it and set up a proper colony.[br/][br/]Lieutenant Jiang, lead the way to the Voidtech facility.
好吧，那就让我们一起着手重建吧。由我来指挥，整顿你的定居点，我们需要重新进行部署并建立一个殖民地。[br/][br/]蒋中尉，带我去看看那个虚空科技设施。

Alright Lieutenant, let's get things back on track. I’ll take command here. Pack up your settlement so we can redeploy it and set up a proper colony.[br/][br/]Then you'll accompany us to the Voidtech Landmark.
好吧，中尉，那就让我们一起着手重建吧。由我来指挥，整顿你的定居点，我们需要重新进行部署并建立一个殖民地。[br/][br/]然后你带我去看看那个虚空科技设施。

Now that you have a new Colonizer unit, you can found a second colony. A new colony will expand your domain on this planet and increase your income and economic growth.[br/][br/][recommendedcol]Hint: you can found a colony by moving a Colonizer onto the center of a sector and then selecting the ‘Found Vanguard Colony’ button in the sector interface menu.[br/][br/]A colony cannot be placed in a sector adjacent to an existing colony.[/recommendedcol]
你拥有了一个新的殖民者单位，现在你可以建立第二个殖民地了。建立新的殖民地将会扩张你在这个星球上的领域，从而提高你的收益和经济增长。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]提示：你可以将殖民者移动至区域的中央，然后在区域界面菜单中选择“建立先锋殖民地”按钮来建立殖民地。[br/][br/]新的殖民地无法建立在与现有殖民地相邻的区域中。[/recommendedcol]

Colonizer - A unit that creates new colonies in available sectors
Found Vanguard Colony - Interface button to create a colony once a colonizer is on an available sector
Found a new colony in the Maeva sector
在玛艾瓦区域建立一个新的殖民地
Warning: incoming gravitronic wave in 2.26 seconds.
警告：引力波将于 2.26 秒后来袭。
A gravitronic wave passed through this system, origin unknown.
一道引力波经过了此星系，来源未知。
Well it looks like we’re all still holding on to our atoms. Status report.
好吧，看来我们都没有什么大碍。汇报状况。

Preliminary readings indicate that the Void anomaly absorbed most of the gravitronic force, keeping the planet relatively unaffected.[br/][br/]For further analysis, I will need to connect to the Voidtech facility. It contains advanced sensors that are attuned to the Void anomaly.
初步测定表明虚空异常吸收了大多数引力波，这个星球没有受到太大影响。[br/][br/]如需深入分析，我需要连接至那个虚空科技设施，里面配备着专为虚空异常准备的先进传感器。
Void - name of an unknown dimension; the anomaly permeates from this place
Alright, we'll move in and get you hooked up to the Voidtech facility ASAP.
好吧，我们将尽快前往那座虚空科技设施并让你建立连接。
There are signs of battle all over the structure. Lieutenant Jiang, is the facility still operational?
这栋建筑中到处是交战留下的痕迹。蒋中尉，这座设施仍在运作吗？
The damage you see on the structure is all superficial; all of the heavy fighting occurred on the outskirts.
你在这栋建筑中看到的破坏只是九牛一毛而已，真正激烈的战斗全都发生在外围地带。
Aiva, can you access the facility and use its sensors to see what's happening with the Void anomaly?
A.I.V.A.，你能够获得设施的访问权限并使用传感器查明虚空异常的情况吗？
Aiva - AI that has been helping throughout this campaign
Access to the facility is encrypted, Commander. Establishing a connection will require the Voidtech facility to be annexed to a colony so that I can link directly to their mainframe.
设施访问权限经过加密，指挥官。建立联系需要先将虚空科技设施吞并至殖民地内，这样我就可以直接与它的主机相连。
We don’t have time to lose. We‘ll found our second colony nearby and annex this sector to it.
我们没有时间可以浪费了。我们会在附近建立第二个殖民地，然后将这片区域吞并。
We don’t have time to lose. We’ve founded a new colony nearby that we can annex the landmark sector to.
我们没有时间可以浪费了。我们已经在附近建立了一个殖民地，可以将这片地标区域吞并了。
This must have been the main research facility for investigating the Void anomaly. There are signs of combat all over the structure... are these recent?
这一定就是用来调查虚空异常的主要研究设施了，这里到处都是战斗的痕迹…是最近产生的吗？

Thermal analysis of the structure and the surrounding area indicate that combat took place within the last few cycles, Commander. Additionally, I have detected distinctive tracks leading away from the facility. Analysis shows these tracks to be of Vanguard origin.
经过对建筑和周围地区的热能分析，战斗发生在数个周期之前，指挥官。另外，我侦测到一些逐渐远离设施的轨迹。经过分析表明，这些轨迹是先锋留下的。
So, some of them survived after all. Lets follow these tracks and see what we can find.
也就是说，他们之中还是有人活下来了。跟着这些轨迹前进，看看我们能发现些什么。
Thermal analysis of the structure and the surrounding area indicate that combat took place within the last few cycles, Commander. Additionally, I have-
经过对建筑和周围地区的热能分析，战斗发生在数个周期之前，指挥官。另外，我侦测到——
Dammit Aiva, is there nothing inside that brain but electrons, Jiang needs our help!
该死，A.I.V.A.，你的脑子里除了电子元件之外还有什么？蒋需要我们的帮助！
Establishing database connection…[br/]…[br/]Connection to Voidtech facility database established.[br/]Running analysis of Void anomaly…
正在建立数据库连接…[br/]…[br/]与虚空科技设施数据库建立连接完毕。[br/]正在运行虚空异常分析…
汇报情况。你有什么发现？
The Void anomaly has started to expand exponentially. There is a 99.07% chance that the planet will be consumed by the anomaly within the next three cycles.
虚空异常已经开始呈指数增长，这个星球有 99.07% 的几率将在三个周期内被虚空异常彻底吞噬。
Backup all data from the facility and get everyone evacuated. There is no time to waste!
备份设施内的所有数据，命令所有人撤离。没有时间可以浪费了！

Backup status: complete.[br/]Planetary escape vectors: calculated.[br/][br/]Caution: due to Void disturbance, there is a 33.1% chance of catastrophic failure during gravity well escape. Safety margins need to be overridden before a course can be locked in.
备份状态：完成。[br/]星球撤离航线：计算完毕。[br/][br/]警告：由于虚空动荡，逃离重力井时有 33.1% 的几率会出现灾难性失败。需先推翻安全边际量才可锁定路线。
To hell with the safety margins! There's 100% chance we'll die if we stay! Lock in the escape vectors and get us out of this hellhole!
去他的安全边际量！如果我们待在这里 100% 会死！锁定撤离航线，离开这个该死的地方！
Hurg... I have fallen in combat. If only I had Tappels with me... don't worry commander, I will be by your side as we explore.
呃…我在战斗中倒下了。要是塔贝尔斯在我身边就好了…别担心，指挥官，我会永远与你同在。
Tappels - a mechanical dog that appears on the next Vanguard Campaign Mission
Find out what happened to the research center on this planet.
查明这个星球的研究中心发生了什么事情。
Help Daiyu Jiang defeat the Hopperhound threat.
帮助蒋黛雨清除跳蝗的威胁。

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
